messages.message:
I stumbled into a magic string that breaks the converse app. since the model emitted this string, my converse app freezes up every time I try to open it (CPU pegged at 100%). I tried pasting the same string as a query in a fresh environment, and saw the same behavior. both environments are now unusable on my account :slightly_smiling_face:

from some quick profiling I think that the markdown parsing is whatâ€™s hanging, maybe a bug in markdown-to-jsx (https://github.com/probablyup/markdown-to-jsx)?

```($ in millions, except earnings per share)             Q1  FY24     Q4 FY23      Q1 FY23         Q/Q             Y/Y
     Revenue                                               $  7,192     $  6,051     $  8,288         Up  19%        Down   13%
     Gross margin                                              64.6%        63.3%        65.5%      Up  1.3 pts    Down   0.9 pts
     Operating expenses                                    $  2,508     $  2,576     $  3,563       Down   3%        Down   30%
     Operating income                                      $  2,140     $  1,257     $  1,868         Up  70%           Up  15%
     Net income                                            $  2,043     $  1,414     $  1,618         Up  44%           Up  26%
     Diluted earnings per share                            $   0.82     $   0.57     $   0.64         Up  44%           Up  28%```
